TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubsetMatchingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 列舉子集比對模式的值。

span.span: Enumerates values of subset matching mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks System.Speech，在中，您可以建構成功辨識片語，即使只是其內容的子集的音訊輸入中找到的文法。In System.Speech, you can construct a grammar that successfully recognizes a phrase even though only a subset of its contents is found in the audio input. 根據預設，辨識引擎需要整個片語完全相符。By default, a recognition engine requires an exact match against an entire phrase. 辨識引擎也可以比對部分的片語，根據所定義的參數做為引數的成員或是建構函式，或方法。The recognition engine can also match partial phrases according to parameters defined by a member used as an argument to the or constructors, or the method. 下圖說明每個方式的成員會影響使用中的文法包含片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 時的辨識。The following illustrates how each of the members affects recognition when used in a grammar that contains the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane". **OrderedSubset****OrderedSubset** 這個模式表示將使用的片語子集，來成功地辨識該整個片語，如果符合下列條件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 片語中的一或多個字組會辨識的音訊輸入。One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input. - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序是相同的片語。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 只有介係詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 新增至使用 OrderedSubset 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubset mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"car 的平面""a car the that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 原始字串的序列不需要可辨識的子集。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的平面的卡車船隻""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 文字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介係詞和發行項來辨識。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **OrderedSubsetContentRequired****OrderedSubsetContentRequired** 這個模式表示將使用的片語子集，來成功地辨識該整個片語，如果符合下列條件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 片語中的一或多個字組會辨識的音訊的輸入，並One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input, and - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序是相同的片語。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 相符的文字不能包含只有介係詞和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 新增至使用 OrderedSubsetContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubsetContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"car 的平面""a car the that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 原始字串的序列不需要可辨識的子集。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的平面的卡車船隻""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 文字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 語音輸入必須包含文章和介係詞以外的文字。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| **子序列：****Subsequence:** 這個模式表示將使用的片語子集，來成功地辨識該整個片語，如果符合下列條件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 以一連串的片語，片語中的一個或多個字辨識的音訊輸入和One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase, and - 這些可辨識的單字的相對順序是相同的片語。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 只有介係詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 新增至使用子序列模式的文法，就會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using Subsequence mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"car 的平面""a car the that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 可辨識的部分必須是原始字串的序列。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的平面的卡車船隻""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 文字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 介係詞和發行項來辨識。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **SubsequenceContentRequired****SubsequenceContentRequired** 這個模式表示將使用的片語子集，來成功地辨識該整個片語，如果符合下列條件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 比對字串中的一或多個字詞的音訊輸入辨識為一連串的片語。One or more words in the match string are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase. - 相符的文字不能包含只有介係詞和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 將片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 新增至使用 SubsequenceContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using SubsequenceContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**輸入的片語****Input Phrase**|**結果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat that plane"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |「 汽車的船隻卡車 」"a car the truck a boat"|整個片語 「 汽車的平面的船隻卡車 」 是可辨識。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"car 的平面""a car the that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 可辨識的部分必須是原始字串的序列。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |「 汽車的平面的卡車船隻""a car the boat a truck that plane"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 文字會失序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|無法成功辨識。Recognition is not successful. 語音輸入必須包含文章和介係詞以外的文字。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| ## Examples 以下是測試常式會產生四個物件，針對每個使用相同的片語， `SubsetMatchingModes`。Below is a test routine which generates four objects, using the same phrase, for each of the `SubsetMatchingModes`. 這些物件再進行測試。These objects can then be tested. ``` private void CreateSubsetMatchTest() { foreach ( System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode mode in Enum.GetValues(typeof(System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode))) { GrammarBuilder gb = new GrammarBuilder("a car the truck a boat that plane",mode); Grammar grammar = new Grammar(gb); grammar.Name = mode.ToString(); grammar.Enabled=true; _recognizer.LoadGrammar(grammar); } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubset = int32(1)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubset**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubsetContentRequired = int32(3)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode Subsequence = int32(0)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **Subsequence**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode SubsequenceContentRequired = int32(2)

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **SubsequenceContentRequired**.
